long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can record the content displayed in the tab instantly and easily.

Features:
* Window resizing.
* Recording resolution customization.
* Bitrate customization.
* Supports video only, audio only and both.
* Works offline as well.

This is an open source project, the source code is publicly available.
https://github.com/ww24/chrome-tab-recorder

We developed this extension because we needed an extension that could be used safely from the perspective of security and privacy.
